marketing information:
Sleek modern design and a built-in Web Cam make this the perfect Monitor for the Office or Home use. Eliminate the need for an extra Web Cam or Speakers since both are built into the DoubleSight 21.5" DS-220C Monitor. Built with the latest LED Back Light Technology, the DS-220C will provide sharp, bright colors for years to come The DS-220C is Energy Star Certified and comes with a 3 Year Warranty. Like all DoubleSight Products, this Monitor is fully TAA Compliant.
The DS-220C is VESA compatible and can be mounted on your Desk Top with any one of the DoubleSight Multi Monitor Flex Stands or Single Monitor Flex Arms for a truly custom and ergonomic fit.
